duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of web portals supporting customer, employer, and broker personas in partnership with senior business leaders and development teams.
Provide direction, guidance, and ownership for roadmap execution and delivery.
Ensure web portal development achieves critical milestones on time and on budget.
Own the Product Roadmap, defining and prioritizing features in alignment with portfolio objectives.
Represent voice of the customer and consider their point of view to best solve their problems.
Participate in Planning and work with Architects to understand enabler related work.
Embrace ambiguity and high degree of complexity associated with standing up a new business.
Break down work into manageable parts for agile teams to co-solution and build.
Facilitate deliveries that include multiple third-parties and internal resources.
Thrive in a fast-paced environment, juggling multiple priorities and deadlines.
Drive innovation with an experimental mindset.
Partner with business leaders to continuously align the product vision and roadmap to the capabilities needed to bring business strategy to life.
Provide timely communication between teams and senior management and monitor value achieved vs. planned.
Consider people, processes, technology, and data changes and impact when prioritizing work with the development team.
Carefully plan and oversee web portal development to ensure it aligns with the business strategy and desired outcomes.
Set an agenda in line with company priorities and drive high-impact, high-quality work product through collaborative and individual efforts.
Measure and report on the performance of web portal development using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in an IT-related field (Master's preferred)
